trans-unit.source: Provides the managed definition of the <see langword="IStream" /> interface, with <see langword="ISequentialStream" /> functionality.

For more information, see the documentation for the [IStream](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa380034.aspx) and [ISequentialStream](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa380010.aspx) interfaces in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación para el [IStream](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa380034.aspx) y [ISequentialStream](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa380010.aspx) interfaces en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an `HRESULT` other than `S_OK`.
trans-unit.target: Common language runtime produce una excepción cuando un método COM en código nativo devuelve un `HRESULT` distinto de `S_OK`.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [Cómo: mapa HRESULT y excepciones](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the new stream object.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Creates a new stream object with its own seek pointer that references the same bytes as the original stream.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IStream::Clone` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IStream::Clone` en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: A value that controls how the changes for the stream object are committed.
Ensures that any changes made to a stream object that is open in transacted mode are reflected in the parent storage.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IStream::Commit` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IStream::Commit` en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the destination stream.
The number of bytes to copy from the source stream.
On successful return, contains the actual number of bytes read from the source.
On successful return, contains the actual number of bytes written to the destination.
Copies a specified number of bytes from the current seek pointer in the stream to the current seek pointer in another stream.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IStream::CopyTo` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IStream::CopyTo` en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: The byte offset for the beginning of the range.
The length of the range, in bytes, to restrict.
The requested restrictions on accessing the range.
Restricts access to a specified range of bytes in the stream.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IStream::LockRegion` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IStream::LockRegion` en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the data read from the stream.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
The number of bytes to read from the stream object.
A pointer to a <see langword="ULONG" /> variable that receives the actual number of bytes read from the stream object.
Reads a specified number of bytes from the stream object into memory starting at the current seek pointer.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `ISequentialStream::Read` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `ISequentialStream::Read` en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: Discards all changes that have been made to a transacted stream since the last <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IStream.Commit(System.Int32)" /> call.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IStream::Revert` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IStream::Revert` en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: The displacement to add to <c>dwOrigin</c>.
The origin of the seek.
The origin can be the beginning of the file, the current seek pointer, or the end of the file.
On successful return, contains the offset of the seek pointer from the beginning of the stream.
Changes the seek pointer to a new location relative to the beginning of the stream, to the end of the stream, or to the current seek pointer.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IStream::Seek` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IStream::Seek` en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: The new size of the stream as a number of bytes.
Changes the size of the stream object.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IStream::SetSize` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IStream::SetSize` en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see langword="STATSTG" /> structure that describes this stream object.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Members in the <see langword="STATSTG" /> structure that this method does not return, thus saving some memory allocation operations.
Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.STATSTG" /> structure for this stream.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IStream::Stat` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IStream::Stat` en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: The byte offset for the beginning of the range.
The length, in bytes, of the range to restrict.
The access restrictions previously placed on the range.

Removes the access restriction on a range of bytes previously restricted with the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IStream.LockRegion(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int32)" /> method.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IStream::UnlockRegion` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IStream::UnlockRegion` en MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write this stream to.
The number of bytes to write to the stream.
On successful return, contains the actual number of bytes written to the stream object.
If the caller sets this pointer to <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />, this method does not provide the actual number of bytes written.
Writes a specified number of bytes into the stream object starting at the current seek pointer.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `ISequentialStream::Write` in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `ISequentialStream::Write` en MSDN Library.
